keys (features): [('T', '1h', 6), ('T', '6h', 4), ('SWDR', '1h', 6), ('SWDR', '6h', 4), ('rh', '1h', 6), ('rh', '6h', 4)]
values:
 (T, 1h, h=6) -> DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 120, 1]), ytorch.Size([32, 6])
 (T, 6h, h=4) -> DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 56, 1]), ytorch.Size([32, 4])
 (SWDR, 1h, h=6) -> DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 120, 1]), ytorch.Size([32, 6])
 (SWDR, 6h, h=4) -> DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 56, 1]), ytorch.Size([32, 4])
 (rh, 1h, h=6) -> DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 120, 1]), ytorch.Size([32, 6])
 (rh, 6h, h=4) -> DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 56, 1]), ytorch.Size([32, 4])

-- mv_loaders: {res: {'train': DL, 'val': DL, 'test': DL}} --

container type: <class 'dict'>
num entries: 3
keys (resolutions): ['1h', '6h', '24h']
values (per resolution → split):
 [1h] splits: ['train', 'val', 'test']
    train: DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 120, 3]), ytorch.Size([32, 1])
    val: DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 120, 3]), ytorch.Size([32, 1])
    test: DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 120, 3]), ytorch.Size([32, 1])

    train: DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 56, 3]), ytorch.Size([32, 1])
    val: DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 56, 3]), ytorch.Size([32, 1])
    test: DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 56, 3]), ytorch.Size([32, 1])

num entries: 2
keys (features): [('1h', 6), ('6h', 4)]
values:
 (1h, h=6) -> DataLoader batch Xtorch.Size([32, 120, 3]), ytorch.Size([32, 6])
